website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Air Jordan XI Retro is more popularly bought as a collectible or worn as a casual sneaker rather than a performance basketball shoe. Although it is a solid performer on-court, for its price of $220, many testers say that there are other shoes with better technologies at cheaper prices.
pros: Majority of the users purchased the shoe due to its aesthetic appeal, saying that the Air  Jordan XI Retro was a "head turner
The Craftsmanship and quality of the shoe are good according to most of the reviewers
Many of the testers appreciate the mix of solid and clear rubber in the outsole
the hard rubber grips the floor when the sticky rubber starts to attracts dust
Some players love how the padded mesh on the upper is breathable
Most of the buyers are re-purchasers of the Jordan 11, commenting that the shoe brought nostalgia
The upper provides good lockdown, shares a few testers
A couple of users like how the upper is stiff enough to offer foot support
It feels like the first Zoom Kobe Protro of Nike hugging the ankle
cons: Some notice that the forefoot feels tight, adding that the leather takes some time to stretch
One tester even feels uncomfortable because the material keeps rubbing on his pinky toe
Many reviewers say that the due to the stickiness of the clear rubber on the outsole, dust clings very fast to it, making it necessary for them to do regular wipes
A few shoe owners experience unexplainable squeaking with their shoes

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: They are fake do not buy, product ships from China the carbon fiber is just painted on! They fit to big to be a size 10 ! Do not buy fake

customer_reviews.title: don't buy. thumbs DOWN
customer_reviews.text: they did not come in the original space jam shoe box. they were dirty. they felt used and abused and worn out. they had different bar codes on the size and had different manufactured dates on them. and someone's initials were markered with a red marker on the shot size tag inside.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they are fake
customer_reviews.text: Today we learned that the pair of Air Jordan 11s that we bought last year were not authentic. A well-regarded expert on collectible sneakers had a very close look at them as well as the box that they came in and determined that they are not real. I bought these on behalf of my son with his money. I tried to caution him from buying from an unknown seller, but he wanted them so bad that he didn't want to believe that anyone would do that.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SERVICE AND PRODUCT!! WOULD ORDER AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't get into the Jordan ordeal, but my husband wanted these to complete his 15 year collection. I ordered Fri. morning, and email requested a rush for Christmas. Seller responded to my email < 1 hr. All concerns addressed. Seller rushed: order came next day Saturday, no lie. I Informed Seller that my husband knows real from phony. The shoes checked out 100%. Great customer service, response time, & 100% authentic. Gave my husband shoes early for holiday party w/i 24 hrs of ordering them: now THAT'S great customer service! 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Toiana Almon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes...shipping? Ehh......
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are awesome!!! Everything about them is great. The packaging, the smell, an overall great experience with a shoe I love! However, the shipping left something to be desired. The Friday the shoes were supposed to be delivered, they sat on a FedEX truck over the weekend until Monday morning. they did make me the "first delivery that day dropping them off @ around 7:06am. That kinda made up for waiting all day Friday.

product_meta.title: Nike Men's 378037-003 Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: The Air Jordan XI has become the most sought-after Air Jordan design ever created. This popular model was first released in 1995 when Jordan laced them up and led the Chicago Bulls to an all-time NBA best 72-win season. The stylish Air Jordan XI features a Cordura upper, carbon fiber spring plate, wraparound patent leather detail, and a translucent sole. They have been released in several colorways, which are referred to as Bred, Concord, Columbia, Space Jam and Cool Grey models.
